TopicTitle: The LASC - Low Altitude Spacecraft Carrier

Articles.Content:
The Low Altitude Spacecraft Carrier is an big Bomber to Launch Small Spacecrafts from an altitude of 2.5-3.5 km. It\'s currently under developement, also have an very bad construction i use the LASC to launch the Space Shuttle Hope into Sub-Orbital Trajectory.

Effective to launch Spaceplanes, that are originally not designed for Powered Flight.

Effective to launch Ballistic Missiles

Cannot use ASAS until Separation.

Hard Maneuvering

Can damage Spaceplane during separation

After Sepration, the LASC Crashes.

The LASC can be damaged during separation

Recommendations:

Do not use ASAS until Separation!

Drop the Spaceplane short BEFORE burnout!
